summary_detail.value: Community Meeting To discuss the current fire situation in the area of Thompson Falls and Plains 6 PM Friday, September 1, 2017 Thompson Falls Community Center 410 Golf Street, Thompson Falls  Representatives from the Lolo and Kootenai National Forests, Sanders County Sheriff’s Department, Montana Disaster and Emergency Services, Sanders County Emergency Management, and the Department of Natural Resources and Conservation will be present to discuss the suppression effort, area and road closures, evacuation warnings and contingency

title: Plains-Thompson Falls Community Meeting_Fire Situation_9-1-2017 (Sheep Gap Wildfire)
